segments.text: Mr . Jones , shall we now discuss the packaging ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . You know , we have definite ways of packaging garments . As to blouses , we use a polythene wrapper for each article , all ready for window display .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . A wrapping that catches the eye will certainly help push the sales . With competition from similar garments producers , the merchandise must not only be good value but also look attractive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right you are . We'll see to it that the blouses appeal to the eye as well as to the purse .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the outer packing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll pack them 10 dozens to one carton , gross weight around 25 kilos a carton .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cartons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , corrugated cardboard boxes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you use wooden cases instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why use wooden cases ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid the cardboard boxes are not strong enough for such a heavy load .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cartons are comparatively light , and therefore easy to handle . They won't be stowed away with the heavy cargo . The stevedores will see to that . Besides , we'll reinforce the cartons with straps . Silk blouses are not fragile goods . They can stand a lot of jolting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you are right , but the goods are to be transhipped at Hamburg or London . If the boxes are moved about on an open wharf , the dampness or rain may get into them . This would make the blouses spotted or ruined .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No need to worry about that . The cartons lined with plastic sheets are waterproof , and as the boxes are made of cardboard , they will be handled with care .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't want to take any chances . Besides , cartons are easy to cut open , and this increases the risk of pilferage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tampering with cartons is easily detected . I should say that this rather discourages pilferage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe so , but I'm afraid that in case of damage or pilferage , the insurance company will refuse compensation on the ground of improper packing , or packing unsuitable for sea voyage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But cartons are quite seaworthy . They are extensively used in our shipments to continental ports . There are never any complaints from our clients , and our insurance company has also approved such packing for W . P . A . and T . P . N . D .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you could guarantee compensation in case the insurance com - any refuses to honor a claim for faulty packing , we would be quite willing to accept cartons .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but we can't take on any responsibility that is beyond our functions and powers . We'll make sure that the packing is seaworthy , but we can't commit ourselves to being responsible for every kind of mishap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can understand your position . Perhaps I'm asking too much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll use wooden cases if you insist , but the charge for packing will be considerably higher , and it also slows delivery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'll call you immediately for instructions on the matter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please do . I'll be waiting for your reply .
segments.speaker: S2
